Title: Requires public arbitration panel to which a dispute is referred to consider above all other factors the financial ability of the public employer to pay, as defined
Summary: Requires the public arbitration panel to which a dispute is referred to consider above all other factors the financial ability of the public employer to pay, as defined in this bill.
LawCode: Amd ยง209, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to binding arbitration for certain public employees
